list_definition.mean_english: hình dáng in lên nền trời
list_definition.definition: the outline of buildings, hills etc seen against the sky

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I could see something moving on the skyline.

list_ex_of_english: Areas of outstanding beauty are spoilt by pylons crossing the skyline.
Against the skyline, in full sail, was a four-masted, full-rigged ship.
Along with the cathedral, these buildings were the most prominent and their steeples came to dominate the skyline.
Mining activities have significantly altered the landscape, the skyline is dominated by smokestacks and buildings towering over the stark area where silver and lead had been extracted.
However, these electricity pylons wreck the countryside, even if sited below the skyline.
Everywhere a new spirit is alive—a new confidence, with factories humming, new businesses starting up, busy cranes dotting the skyline.
The effect of the scheme on the skyline of the building should be scarcely noticeable.
Here, however, courts were really authorizing the expenditure of public monies for the creation and preservation of parks, rather than the beautification of the skyline.
